alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:57AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Susquehanna, southeastern Bradford and western Wyoming Counties through 230 AM EDT... At 157 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from New Albany to near Lovelton to near Ricketts Glen State Park. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tunkhannock, Wilmot, Hollenback, Mehoopany, Wyalusing, Meshoppen, Forkston, Laceyville, New Albany and Kasson Brook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
